<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Import Historic Needit Data">0adf041447763110bd8cf164336d43a3</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[var dateString = "11-24-2023";
var dateComponents = dateString.split("-");
var month = parseInt(dateComponents[0], 10);
var day = parseInt(dateComponents[1], 10);
var year = parseInt(dateComponents[2], 10);

console.log("Parsed components: Month:", month, "Day:", day, "Year:", year);

var dateObject = new Date(year, month - 1, day);

if (!isNaN(dateObject.getTime())) {
  console.log("Converted date:", dateObject);
} else {
  console.log("Invalid date string");
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-24 21:56:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>268d5c5447b63110bd8cf164336d43f0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onStart</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_268d5c5447b63110bd8cf164336d43f0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-24 21:56:51</sys_updated_on><when>onStart</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
